greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter: a(n) = P(A009191(n), A009194(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
program: from sympy import divisor_sigma, divisor_count, gcd
def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)/2
def a(n): return T(gcd(n, divisor_count(n)), gcd(n, divisor_sigma(n))) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 22 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 21 2017
